channel.title: Zimbabwe on BalleWale Cricket News
channel.description: Recent content in Zimbabwe on BalleWale Cricket News

item.title: Muzarabani Returns as Zimbabwe Opt to Bowl Against Oman in World Cup Qualifier
item.description: Zimbabwe's Tendai Muzarabani makes a comeback as they choose to bowl first against Oman in the World Cup Qualifier match.

item.title: Zimbabwe Look to Hit the Ground Running Against Oman in ICC World Cup Qualifiers
item.description: Zimbabwe aims for a strong start against Oman in the ICC World Cup Qualifiers, seeking to secure their place in the upcoming World Cup.

item.title: Oman's Jatinder Singh Counts on Warm-Up Game 'Psychological Edge' Against Zimbabwe
item.description: Oman's Jatinder Singh believes a warm-up match against Zimbabwe will provide a crucial psychological advantage ahead of their World Cup campaign.

item.title: Zimbabwe Look to Hit the Ground Running Against Oman in ICC Cricket World Cup Qualifiers
item.description: Zimbabwe aims for a strong start against Oman in the ICC Cricket World Cup Qualifiers, seeking to secure a spot in the prestigious tournament.
